item.description:
NEW YEAR'S TOUR OF SICILY
December 27 - January 5

- 8 nights in Sicily

- Daily Breakfast

- Visit of Palermo, Monreale, Agrigento, Taormina, Catania

- Licensed Local Tour Guides to All Cities & Sites
- Welcome dinner in a Sicilian Seafood Specialities Restaurant

- New Year's Eve Dinner - by my Dad Loris

- Cooking Class - Eggplant Parmigiana - by my Mom Gina

- Sicilian Wine & Cheese Tasting

- Private Transportation
- Professional Bilingual, native of Italy Tour Director, myself, Elsa Gramola



Cost: $ 1,950 (instead of $ 2,450) + airfare

I will send you more information on Elsa Gramola tour e-mail me :-)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "NEW YEAR'S TOUR OF SICILY "
